about_the_game:
The Spiciest, Most Explosive Match-3 Game Ever!

Get ready to ignite your puzzle-solving skills with Pepper Blast! This fiery match-3 game takes the beloved genre to new, explosive heights. Whether you’re seeking classic fun or adventurous twists, Pepper Blast has the perfect mode for you. With 5 sizzling game modes to match every mood, you're in for a scorching good time!

Key Features:

5 Ways to Play: From timeless match-3 gameplay to thrilling new challenges, Pepper Blast offers a spicy experience for every type of player.

Classic Mode: Enjoy the timeless fun of match-3 gameplay with a hot twist. New, powerful chili peppers and ultra-smooth action make this mode a blast!

Rock Mode: Navigate through rocky obstacles and blast your way to success. Only the most strategic players will overcome these solid challenges!

Ice Block Mode: Freeze and thaw your way through icy puzzles. Melt the ice blocks with blazing matches and keep the game moving!

Thief Mode: Outsmart sneaky thieves trying to steal your precious peppers. Match quickly and strategically to foil their plans and claim your rewards!

Fusion Mode: Experience the ultimate challenge as multiple elements — rocks, ice, and thieves — combine in one explosive mode. Can you handle the chaos?

High-Definition Graphics: Experience the vibrant, explosive world of Pepper Blast with stunning visuals and immersive sounds.

Ultra-Smooth Action: Enjoy seamless gameplay with multiple matches happening simultaneously as new chili peppers fall into place.

Get ready to turn up the heat and dive into the most explosive match-3 game ever. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the genre, Pepper Blast offers endless fun and challenges to keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to feel the burn?

  • OS *: win7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel E2140/Athlon 64 x2 4000
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: G41
